name: Andong Tour
description: Andong is known as a center of culture and folk traditions. The surrounding area maintains many ancient traditions, so in mid October the Andong Folk Festival is held. One of the most famous aspects of these cultural festivities are the Andong masks.The Hahoe Folk Village is another notable folk village in South Korea. Andong was a home of Confucian studies and academies during the Joseon Dynasty.
